text: The 1929–30 international cricket season was from September 1929 to April 1930. ==Season overview== {| class="wikitable" ! colspan="7" |International tours |- ! rowspan="2" |Start date ! rowspan="2" |Home team ! rowspan="2" |Away team ! colspan="4" |Results [Matches] |- !Test !ODI !FC !LA |- | | |Marylebone |; style="text-align:center"| — |; style="text-align:center"| — |2–2 [5] |; style="text-align:center"| — |- | | | |; style="text- align:center"| — |; style="text-align:center"| — |1–0 [1] |; style="text- align:center"| — |- | | | |0–1 [4] |; style="text-align:center"| — |; style="text-align:center"| — |; style="text-align:center"| — |- | | | |1–1 [4] |; style="text-align:center"| — |; style="text-align:center"| — |; style="text-align:center"| — |- | | | |; style="text-align:center"| — |; style="text-align:center"| — |0–1 [3] |; style="text-align:center"| — |- | | | |; style="text-align:center"| — |; style="text-align:center"| — |0–0 [1] |; style="text-align:center"| — |} ==October== === MCC in Australia === {| class="wikitable" |- ! colspan="9"|First-class Series |- ! title: International cricket in 1929–30
